INSERT INTO APPROVAL_LINE (doc_cd, mber_id, sign_seq, sign_opn, sign_dt, sign_name) VALUES (#{docCd}, #{mberId}, #{signSeq}, #{signOpn}, sysdate, #{signName})
INSERT INTO RECEPTION (recept_cd, doc_cd, mber_id, dept_cd) VALUES ('RCPTN' || seq_reception_cd.NEXTVAL, #{docCd}, #{mberId}, #{deptCd})

AND ROWNUM <= #{end} ) WHERE rn >= #{start} ORDER BY draft_dt DESC
